## Node.Traversal interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface Traversal 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [composed?](./alfa-dom.node_namespace.traversal_interface.composed_propertysignature.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> When <code>true</code>, traverse the node in shadow-including tree order.[https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/\#concept-shadow-including-tree-order](https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/#concept-shadow-including-tree-order) |
|  [flattened?](./alfa-dom.node_namespace.traversal_interface.flattened_propertysignature.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> When <code>true</code>, traverse the flattened element tree rooted at the node.[https://drafts.csswg.org/css-scoping/\#flat-tree](https://drafts.csswg.org/css-scoping/#flat-tree) |
|  [nested?](./alfa-dom.node_namespace.traversal_interface.nested_propertysignature.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> When <code>true</code>, traverse all nested browsing contexts encountered.[https://html.spec.whatwg.org/\#nested-browsing-context](https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#nested-browsing-context) |
